data.name: 捕鱼王国Fishing Kingdom
data.detailed_description:
[How to Play]
Fishing requires firing bullets. Firing bullets costs gold coins. You can win gold coins after catching fish.
Upgrade the turret multipler to increase the gold coin income, up to 10000 times. One shot can win hundreds of millions of gold coins at most.

A variety of fish: ordinary fish, bonus fish, event fish that can trigger a variety of small games, boss fish that can drop a large number of treasures

A variety of ultimate Magic: water horse, whale explosion, tornado, Hellfire, ice ring, solar eclipse, black hole, meteorite
data.about_the_game:
[How to Play]
Fishing requires firing bullets. Firing bullets costs gold coins. You can win gold coins after catching fish.
Upgrade the turret multipler to increase the gold coin income, up to 10000 times. One shot can win hundreds of millions of gold coins at most.

A variety of fish: ordinary fish, bonus fish, event fish that can trigger a variety of small games, boss fish that can drop a large number of treasures

A variety of ultimate Magic: water horse, whale explosion, tornado, Hellfire, ice ring, solar eclipse, black hole, meteorite
data.short_description: Fishing Kingdom is a slot-machine style causal fishing game. No need for complex playing skills, just shot fish, win gold and collect treasure, super relaxation, super decompression.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64Bits
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 | AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit | Windows 8 64-bit | Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K | AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
